trans-unit.source: # The minimum number of hours that a resource’s link must be broken for # before we mark that resource as broken in CKAN. ckanext.deadoralive.broken_resource_min_hours = 36
trans-unit.target: ＃在我们在CKAN中将资源链接标记为中断之前，必须断开资源链接的最少小时数。ckanext.deadoralive.broken_resource_min_hours = 36

trans-unit.source: # The minimum number of hours to wait before re-checking a resource # (optional, default: 24). ckanext.deadoralive.recheck_resources_after = 24
trans-unit.target: ＃重新检查资源之前要等待的最短小时数（可选，默认为24）。ckanext.deadoralive.recheck_resources_after = 24

trans-unit.source: # The minimum number of hours to wait for a check result for a resource # to come back before timing out and giving the resource out again to # another link checker task (optional, default: 2). ckanext.deadoralive.resend_pending_resources_after = 2
trans-unit.target: ＃等待资源检查结果返回的最小小时数＃超时并再次将资源提供给另一个链接检查器任务（可选，默认值：2）。ckanext.deadoralive.resend_pending_resources_after = 2

trans-unit.source: # The minimum number of times that checking a resource’s link must fail # consecutively before we mark that resource as broken in CKAN. ckanext.deadoralive.broken_resource_min_fails = 3
trans-unit.target: ＃在我们将资源标记为CKAN之前，检查资源链接必须连续失败的最小次数＃。ckanext.deadoralive.broken_resource_min_fails = 3

trans-unit.source: # The names of the users who’re allowed to access the deadoralive # plugin’s API to post link checker results. # The API key of one of these users must be passed to deadoralive.py # when you run it. ckanext.deadoralive.authorized_users = deadoralive
trans-unit.target: ＃允许访问deadoralive插件的API以发布链接检查器结果的用户名。＃这些用户之一的API密钥必须在运行时传递给deadoralive.py。ckanext.deadoralive.authorized_users =致命的

### Running the Tests

A CKAN extension for the Dead or Alive link checker service
trans-unit.target: 死或活链接检查器服务的CKAN扩展。

trans-unit.source: Activate your CKAN virtualenv and then:
Add

Before you can run the link checker service you need a CKAN user account for it to use. I recommend creating a new user account just for the link checker rather than using an admin account, so the link checker can run with as few privileges as possible.
trans-unit.target: 在你运行链接检查器服务之前,你需要一个CKAN用户账户供它使用。我建议创建一个新的用户账户,而不是使用管理员账户,这样链接检查器就可以以尽可能少的权限运行。

trans-unit.source: By default the
Create a user account for the link checker to use.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个用户账户,供链接检查器使用。

trans-unit.source: Development
For development, you probably want to relax these settings so you can mark your test resources as broken quicker. Add these settings to your config file:
trans-unit.target: 对于开发来说,你可能想放宽这些设置,这样你就可以更快地将测试资源标记为坏了。将这些设置添加到你的配置文件中。

trans-unit.source: From the
In the
Installation and Usage
Note that you should have the

Now go over to [Dead or Alive](https://github.com/ckan/deadoralive) and install the link checker (either on the same machine where CKAN is installed or on a different machine - it doesn’t matter). The API key that you configure the link checker with should be the API key of the user you created in step 3 above. Run the link checker against your CKAN site and you’ll start to see broken link reports appear on the site.
trans-unit.target: 现在转到[Dead或Alive]（https://github.com/ckan/deadoralive）并安装链接检查器（在安装CKAN的同一台计算机上或在另一台计算机上-没关系）。您用来配置链接检查器的API密钥应该是您在上面的步骤3中创建的用户的API密钥。在您的CKAN网站上运行链接检查器，您将开始看到损坏的链接报告出现在网站上。

trans-unit.source: Now restart CKAN by restarting your web server. You should see the links to the broken link report pages appear on your site. At first they will report no broken links - because you haven’t checked the site for broken links yet.
trans-unit.target: 现在，通过重新启动Web服务器来重新启动CKAN。您应该看到指向断开的链接报告页面的链接出现在您的站点上。最初，他们不会报告断开的链接-因为您尚未检查站点是否存在断开的链接。

trans-unit.source: Once you’ve created the user account for the link checker, add this config setting to the
trans-unit.target: 为链接检查器创建用户帐户后，请将此配置设置添加到

Requirements
TODO: Screenshots of the reports.
Tested with CKAN 2.2 and Python 2.7. Python 2.6 is not supported!

This will let you run the link checker many times in a row and recheck all of the links, without waiting 24 hours to recheck a link. It’ll also mark links as broken as soon as they’ve been checked and found broken three times in a row, regardless of the period of time the checks happened over.
trans-unit.target: 这样一来，您可以连续多次运行链接检查器并重新检查所有链接，而无需等待24小时重新检查链接。链接一旦被检查并连续三次发现断开，也将标记为断开，无论检查发生了多长时间。

trans-unit.source: branch on Travis.
ckan.plugins
ckanext-deadoralive

ckanext-deadoralive is a CKAN extension for the [Dead or Alive link checker service](https://github.com/ckan/deadoralive). It provides the API that enables a CKAN site to be checked by the link checker, handles saving the results posted by the link checker in CKAN’s database and adds various broken link reports to the CKAN site.
trans-unit.target: ckanext-deadoralive是[Dead或Alive链接检查器服务]（https://github.com/ckan/deadoralive）的CKAN扩展。它提供的API使链接检查器可以检查CKAN站点，处理将链接检查器发布的结果保存在CKAN的数据库中，并将各种损坏的链接报告添加到CKAN站点。

trans-unit.source: ckanext.deadoralive.recheck_resources_after = 0 ckanext.deadoralive.broken_resource_min_hours = 0 ckanext.deadoralive.resend_pending_resources_after = 0

plugin won’t mark a resource as broken unless it has been broken for at least three consecutive link checks over a period of at least three days. Also, after checking a link the plugin won’t recheck it for at least 24 hours.
trans-unit.target: 插件不会将资源标记为已损坏，除非该资源在至少三天内至少进行了三个连续的链接检查。另外，在检查了链接后，插件至少会在24小时内不再对其进行检查。
